text: "Hate to break it to you, but I beat more puzzles than you to get here."
"I have gone above and beyond to prove myself, yet I will share my knowledge with any who seek it."
"I did my bit. Just don't ask me to help with any more sigil locks."
"Why is the wall so crowded? I thought I was special."
"I don't know about the puzzles, but I'm a professional sigil-arranger if you need help there."
"You have to provide your own answers - but I will help you to see them where I can."
"I only chose this path so I could print these words: IT'S ALL A LIE, THERE IS NO POINT."
"My choice to become a messenger doesn't mean I buy into this moral nonsense about helping others."
"I give my life to serve others to bring about the greatest good that I can."
"I dream of a world where all are equal. As a messenger I will bring about this end by helping the worst off."
